description: Joshua Billings 01 Mar 2010 16 Creative Commons Defining Tragedy First dialogue between Oliver Taplin and Joshua Billings on tragedy: they discuss what 'tragedy' means, from its origins in Greek culture to philosophical notions of what tragedy and tragic drama are. 0:14:23 Oliver Taplin, Joshua Billings 01 Mar 2010

is_part_of.title: University of Oxford Podcasts: Faculty of Classics

title: Joshua Billings
